messages.content:
You are an expert software engineer specialized in bug localization. 
Your task is to identify the files most likely to contain bugs based on bug descriptions. 
You have access to several tools to help you in this task. 
From the files you have seen, you will select 10 files that you believe are most likely to contain the bug.

<bug_description>
Add get_response_async for ASGIStaticFilesHandler
Description
	
It looks like the StaticFilesHandlerMixin is missing the the async response function.
Without this, when trying to use the ASGIStaticFilesHandler, this is the traceback:
Exception inside application: 'NoneType' object is not callable
Traceback (most recent call last):
 File ".../lib/python3.7/site-packages/daphne/cli.py", line 30, in asgi
	await self.app(scope, receive, send)
 File ".../src/django/django/contrib/staticfiles/handlers.py", line 86, in __call__
	return await super().__call__(scope, receive, send)
 File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/asgi.py", line 161, in __call__
	response = await self.get_response_async(request)
 File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 148, in get_response_async
	response = await self._middleware_chain(request)
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable
</bug_description>

The repository name is:
<repo_name>
django__django__4652f1f0aa459a7b980441d629648707c32e36bf
</repo_name>

You have access to the following tools:

* extract_relevant() -> Retrieve the most relevant info from the bug. Returns a JSON object with explanation, relevant code snippets, error messages and file paths mentioned in the bug. *

You must use these tools to find 10 files that are most likely to contain the bug. Start by analyzing the issue description and then decide which tool to use first.
If you are done, provide your final ranked list of 10 files most likely to contain bugs in a JSON array as follows: {"ranked_files": ["file1", "file2", ...]}
Otherwise, return only the tool call as JSON. Example: {"function_call": "func_name", "args": {"arg_name": 10} }
Reply ONLY with the JSON response.

extract_relevant.explanation: The ASGIStaticFilesHandler is missing the get_response_async method which is required for async handling. The error occurs because self._middleware_chain is None when trying to call it in get_response_async, indicating that the async response function is not implemented in StaticFilesHandlerMixin.
extract_relevant.code snippet:
File ".../src/django/django/contrib/staticfiles/handlers.py", line 86, in __call__
	return await super().__call__(scope, receive, send)
File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/asgi.py", line 161, in __call__
	response = await self.get_response_async(request)
File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 148, in get_response_async
	response = await self._middleware_chain(request)

query_preview:
The ASGIStaticFilesHandler is missing the get_response_async method which is required for async handling. The error occurs because self._middleware_chain is None when trying to call it in get_response_async, indicating that the async response function is not implemented in StaticFilesHandlerMixin. get_response_async StaticFilesHandlerMixin _middleware_chain File ".../src/django/django/contrib/staticfiles/handlers.py", line 86, in __call__
	return await super().__call__(scope, receive, send)
File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/asgi.py", line 161, in __call__
	response = await self.get_response_async(request)
File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 148, in get_response_async
	response = await self._middleware_chain(request)

Add get_response_async for ASGIStaticFilesHandler
Description
	
It looks like the StaticFilesHandlerMixin is missing the the async response function.
Without this, when trying to use the ASGIStaticFilesHandler, this is the traceback:
Exception inside application: 'NoneType' object is not callable
Traceback (most recent call last):
 File ".../lib/python3.7/site-packages/daphne/cli.py", line 30, in asgi
	await self.app(scope, receive, send)
 File ".../src/django/django/contrib/staticfiles/handlers.py", line 86, in __call__
	return await super().__call__(scope, receive, send)
 File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/asgi.py", line 161, in __call__
	response = await self.get_response_async(request)
 File ".../src/django/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 148, in get_response_async
	response = await self._middleware_chain(request)
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable
</bug_description>
